title: ITC to acquire organic FMCG brand 24 Mantra Organic for ₹472.5 crore
summary: ITC Limited has announced the acquisition of organic FMCG brand 24 Mantra Organic for ₹472.5 crore, marking a significant move in the organic food and consumer goods sector.
content:
ITC Limited, one of India's leading conglomerates, has announced its plans to acquire the organic FMCG brand 24 Mantra Organic for ₹472.5 crore. The acquisition marks ITC's strategic entry into the growing organic food and consumer goods segment in India.

The deal will help ITC expand its presence in the organic food category and strengthen its overall FMCG portfolio. 24 Mantra Organic is known for its range of organic staples, snacks, and processed foods.

source.title: Who is Vasi Sachi, Tamil TV star Priyanka Deshpande’s second husband
